item.title: RPI Spring Career Fair Location Change
item.description: Attention RPI Students! The RPI Spring Career Fair has been moved to ECAV. Shuttles will depart from Union horseshoe starting at 10:30am. Students may also park in B or E lot. Please register in Handshake for any updates.

item.title: Welcome Back to Campus and the Spring Semester
item.description: It’s time for your semesterly reminder to review the RPI Handbook of Student Rights & Responsibilities. We’ve updated the Student Handbook to clarify expectations, streamline processes, and strengthen support resources for this academic year.
item.author: Students

item.title: Big Game and Valentines Day Packages from 1824 Catering!
item.description: There’s still time to treat your sweetheart or your game day crew to some seriously awesome eats from 1824 Catering! Click the link to find out more information on these packages. Orders for the Big Game are due Friday, February 6th and Valentines Day are due Monday, February 9th. Don’t wait—good food + good company = a win every time!

item.title: Rensselaer Dining – February Upcoming Events
item.description: Rensselaer Dining has a variety of events planned throughout February. Join us and take part in food-focused activities, programs, and opportunities to share your feedback. Click the link above to find out more about our events.

item.title: LMS - New Navigation Look in 2026
item.description: Part of Blackboards January 2026 update will include a visual refresh for a few navigation areas of the LMS. You will see these changes once our system update is complete either on 8 or 9 January 2026. To see the LMS navigation areas that will be updated, you can read the article published in ITSSC LMS’s New Look for 2026. LMS Team

item.description:
